title: Rethinking Urban Mobility Prediction: A Multivariate Time Series Forecasting Approach
details: J Cheng, K Li, Y Liang, L Sun, J Yan, Y Wu - IEEE Transactions on Intelligent …, 2024
abstract: Long-term urban mobility predictions play a crucial role in the effective management of urban facilities and services. Conventionally, urban mobility data has been structured as spatiotemporal videos, treating longitude and latitude grids as …
